entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
